mn151:1.3: Atha kho ayasma sariputto sayanhasamayam patisallana vutthito yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho ayasmantam sariputtam bhagava etadavoca:
mn151:2.1: “Vippasannani kho te, sariputta, indriyani, parisuddho chavivanno pariyodato.
mn151:2.2: Katamena kho tvam, sariputta, viharena etarahi bahulam viharasi”ti?
mn151:2.3: “Sunnataviharena kho aham, bhante, etarahi bahulam viharami”ti.
mn151:2.5: Mahapurisaviharena kira tvam, sariputta, etarahi bahulam viharasi.

mn151:21.2: Yepi hi keci, sariputta, anagatamaddhanam samana va brahmana va pindapatam parisodhessanti, sabbe te evameva paccavekkhitva paccavekkhitva pindapatam parisodhessanti.
